SEARCH
Package HdbManager

Class HdbManagerController

java.lang.Object
HdbManager.HdbManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController
public class HdbManagerController extends Object implements UserController
HdbManagerController handles the operations performed by the HdbManager. This includes managing projects, processing applications, handling enquiries, generating reports, and interacting with other controllers like HdbOfficer, Applicant, etc.

      Constructor to initialize the HdbManagerController with the necessary controllers.
      Parameters:
      projectController - The controller for managing projects.
      officerController - The controller for managing officers.
      applicantController - The controller for managing applicants.
      resAppController - The controller for residential applications.
      teamAppController - The controller for team applications.
      enquiryController - The controller for managing enquiries.
      reportController - The controller for managing reports.

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport(String applicantId)
      Generates a report for the given applicant ID if the application meets the required criteria. The application must have a "BOOKED" status, and the applicant must exist.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant whose report is being generated.

    • createProject

      public void createProject(String name, String neighbourhood, HashMap<Flat.Type,Flat> flatInfo, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, String managerId, int officerSlots, boolean visibility)
      Creates a new project with the specified details. The project is only created if the following conditions are met: there are enough units available for the flats, the officer slots are within valid limits, and the open date is before the close date.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project.
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood where the project is located.
      flatInfo - The flat information including types and available units.
      openDate - The open date for the project.
      closeDate - The close date for the project.
      managerId - The ID of the manager creating the project.
      officerSlots - The number of officer slots available for the project.
      visibility - The visibility status of the project (true for visible, false for hidden).

    • editProject

      public void editProject(String managerId, String name, int officerSlots, boolean visibility)
      Edits an existing project by updating its officer slots and visibility. The manager must be managing the project for the edit to be allowed.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager editing the project.
      name - The name of the project to edit.
      officerSlots - The new number of officer slots for the project.
      visibility - The new visibility status of the project (true for visible, false for hidden).

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(String managerId, String name)
      Deletes an existing project that the manager is managing. The manager must be managing the project for the delete operation to be allowed.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager deleting the project.
      name - The name of the project to delete.

    • processOfficerApplication

      public boolean processOfficerApplication(String managerId, String officerId, boolean status)
      Processes the officer's application for the given manager. It checks if the officer's application exists, whether the manager is managing the relevant project, and if the application has been previously approved or rejected. The status parameter indicates whether to approve (true) or reject (false) the application.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager processing the application.
      officerId - The ID of the officer whose application is being processed.
      status - The status of the application (true for approval, false for rejection).
      Returns:
      true if the process was successful, false otherwise.

    • processApplicantBTOApplication

      public boolean processApplicantBTOApplication(String managerId, String applicantId, boolean status)
      Processes the applicant's BTO application for the given manager. It checks if the applicant's application exists, whether the manager is managing the relevant project, and if the application has been previously approved or rejected. The status parameter indicates whether to approve (true) or reject (false) the application.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager processing the application.
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant whose application is being processed.
      status - The status of the application (true for approval, false for rejection).
      Returns:
      true if the process was successful, false otherwise.

    • approveApplicantWithdrawal

      public boolean approveApplicantWithdrawal(String managerId, String applicantId)
      Approves the withdrawal request for an applicant, changing the status to WITHDRAWN. It checks if the application exists, whether the manager is managing the relevant project, and if the application is in a valid state for withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager processing the withdrawal.
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant whose withdrawal is being processed.
      Returns:
      true if the process was successful, false otherwise.

    • approveOfficerWithdrawal

      public boolean approveOfficerWithdrawal(String managerId, String officerId)
      Approves the withdrawal request for an officer, changing the status to WITHDRAWN. It checks if the application exists, whether the manager is managing the relevant project, and if the application is in a valid state for withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager processing the withdrawal.
      officerId - The ID of the officer whose withdrawal is being processed.
      Returns:
      true if the process was successful, false otherwise.
